## Conversion.Converters.boolean variable

A [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) which converts `unknown` to `boolean`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
boolean: Converter<boolean, undefined>
```

## Remarks

Boolean values or the case-insensitive strings `'true'` and `'false'` succeed. Anything else fails.
